sentences.en: The escapee crossed the border with his family.
sentences.cn: 逃犯与家人一起越过边界.

sentences.en: The escapee descended upon the house and killed the old man and his son.
sentences.cn: 逃犯突袭这间房子杀死老人及其儿子.

sentences.en: The escapee ran quickly northward and cut back to the original place.
sentences.cn: 逃犯迅速向北跑去,然后又突然回到原地.

sentences.en: The escapee took a goal - line stand when he was cornered by the police.
sentences.cn: 在警察把他逼入绝境后,逃犯孤注一掷.

sentences.en: The escapee's turnup is expected soon.
sentences.cn: 预料很快就会出现逃亡者.

sentences.en: The police are beating the town for the escapee.
sentences.cn: 警方正在镇上搜捕那个逃犯.

sentences.en: The scraped escapee taped the grapes into various shapes.
sentences.cn: 擦伤的逃犯用带子把葡萄扎成各种形状.

sentences.en: They beat about the whole length of the country for the escapee.
sentences.cn: 他们在全国各地搜寻那个逃犯.

sentences.en: Why do you always shoot him? He is not the No.1 escapee.
sentences.cn: 你怎么老是拍他,他又不是一级逃犯.
